column1: #Text=It 's opened up a new fan base , so to speak .
#Text=For the last year SNY has broadcast footage of me with my poems , so quite a few fans known about the ' Mets Poet ' .
#Text=I have never called myself that , by the way .
#Text=The back of my jersey says ' The Poet ' because growing up that was my nickname .
#Text=My brother was a runner and they used to call him The Birdman -- Birdie -- and they called me The Poet .
#Text=It was a natural thing , but I never coined myself as ' The Mets Poet .
#Text=DS : Jack Nicholson once said , " The fuel for the sports fan is the ability to have private theories .

#Text= What are some of your private theories ?

column1: #Text=You as a pro-war poet , and Whitehead as a pro-peace poet .
#Text=Forgive the crude terminology ; I realize there is probably nuance in there .
#Text=In the over four years since that tour has your outlook evolved at all ?
